content.raw:
Inheriting `Link` was definitely a mistake, I really wanted this to inherit `Entity<PolicyT, FeaturesT>`, which should allow this to work without adding `FreeGroup` to the `Feature` class.

I would actually like to **not** have a `FreeGroup` template defined in the `Feature` class, because I think this can be a good test case of an entity type that is not part of the basic standard set. If `FreeGroup` works without us pre-defining it in the `Feature` class, then any end user's custom classes can also work with `ign-physics`.
content.html:
Inheriting Link was definitely a mistake, I really wanted this to inherit Entity<PolicyT, FeaturesT>, which should allow this to work without adding FreeGroup to the Feature class.

I would actually like to not have a FreeGroup template defined in the Feature class, because I think this can be a good test case of an entity type that is not part of the basic standard set. If FreeGroup works without us pre-defining it in the Feature class, then any end user's custom classes can also work with ign-physics.
